routes.documentation: Get vehicle details by registration number

responses.body:
{
  "artEndDate": "2007-12-25",
  "co2Emissions": {{faker 'datatype.number'}},
  "colour": "Blue",
  "dateOfLastV5CIssued": "2016-12-25",
  "engineCapacity": 1796,
  "euroStatus": "Euro 5",
  "fuelType": "PETROL",
  "make": "ROVER",
  "markedForExport": true,
  "monthOfFirstDvlaRegistration": "2011-11",
  "monthOfFirstRegistration": "2012-12",
  "motExpiryDate": "2008-12-25",
  "motStatus": "{{oneOf (array 'No details held by DVLA' 'No results returned' 'Not valid' 'Valid')}}",
  "realDrivingEmissions": "1",
  "registrationNumber": "WN67DSO",
  "revenueWeight": 1640,
  "taxDueDate": "2017-12-25",
  "taxStatus": "{{oneOf (array 'Not Taxed for on Road Use' 'SORN' 'Taxed' 'Untaxed')}}",
  "typeApproval": "N1",
  "wheelplan": "NON STANDARD",
  "yearOfManufacture": 2004
}
responses.label: Successful response
Bad Request
Vehicle Not Found
Internal Server Error
Service Unavailable
